game.name: Stone Merge
game.description:
Have you got bored with exploring the old-type puzzle games? If yes, trying this brand new arcade game will definitely take you to a world full of unique challenges and surprises. Stone Merge, as it name suggests, is a kind of free online puzzle game where you have to drag the stone into another one with the same colour and number. It will surely be quite challenging to stop the ever-growing pile of stones. Do you think that you can control it? Join us today to show off your ultimate puzzle skill!

The number and colour of the stones will be increased after the combination of the similar stones. Keep merging them until they help you to build up a big score on the screen in this one of the best puzzle games for kids! Donâ€™t hesitate in moving the stone block to another if possible! We know that you have amazing skill to take care of it and merge the stones together in the best possible way. Give your brain a try to merge all the stones into a bigger number fast! Play this cool HTML5 online game on all devices!

Stone Merge is one of the highly addictive puzzle games available at our website. Some gamers also call it a logic and brain teaser. In order to explore more free games, you are advised to check out our all games and top games page. We hope that you will surely find there a suitable free online game to play. Our fun puzzle games are useful for all gamers irrespective of their age and gender. So, try them out one by one to provide yourself an unforgettable fun treat.
